TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdRotator extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供用于在移动页上显示随机选择的广告的服务器控件。

span.span: Provides a server control to display a randomly selected advertisement on a mobile page.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用与 Web 窗体 类相同的配置文件。The class uses the same configuration file as the Web Forms class. 移动控件公开了许多与 控件相同的属性和事件，并添加了移动功能。The mobile control exposes many of the same properties and events as the control, plus it adds mobile capability. 每次刷新页面时，显示的广告都会发生更改。The displayed advertisement changes whenever the page is refreshed. 属性指定包含公布信息的 XML 文件的位置。The property specifies the location of an XML file that contains advertisement information. 此文件必须位于应用程序域中。This file must reside within the application domain. 出于安全目的，XML 文件应位于 App_Data 文件夹中，该文件夹配置为不允许用户直接访问 XML 文件。For security purposes, XML files should be in the App_Data folder, which is configured to not allow users direct access to XML files. 如果 属性为空，则 控件将生成一个断点标记作为占位符。If the property is empty, the control generates a single break tag as a placeholder. 当您不希望显示广告时，这非常有用。This is useful when you do not want to display an advertisement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例由两部分组成：一个 `.aspx` 文件中的 ASP.NET 移动 Web 窗体页和一个 XML 文件。The following code example consists of two parts: an ASP.NET mobile Web Forms page in an `.aspx` file and an XML file. `.aspx` 文件使用一个名为 `ads.xml` 的文件根据 属性来循环浏览各种播发。The `.aspx` file uses a file named `ads.xml` to rotate through various advertisements based on the property. 如果为示例提供图像，将显示这些图像;否则， 控件将显示播发的 属性的值。If you provide the images for the example, they will be displayed; otherwise, the control displays the value of the property for the advertisements. 用户刷新移动 Web 窗体页时，该页会根据 显示下一个随机选择的播发。When the user refreshes the mobile Web Forms page, the page displays the next randomly selected advertisement, based on the . 该示例还演示了如何使用[\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素在用户浏览器需要 WML 标记的情况下重写属性，以及如何使用 和 将图像的 `src` 和 `href` 特性映射到 XML 文件中的数据。properties。The example also shows how to use a [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element to override the properties if the user's browser requires WML markup, and how to map the image's `src` and `href` attributes to the data in the XML file using the and properties, respectively. 尽管该示例使用函数来确定浏览器是否需要 WML （`isWML11`），但你可以改为使用 web.config 文件来定义一个 元素，.NET Framework 会自动使用该元素来做出确定：Although the example uses a function to determine whether the browser requires WML (`isWML11`), you can instead use a Web.config file to define a element that the .NET Framework automatically uses to make the determination for you: > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). `.aspx` 文件：The `.aspx` file: [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#1)] 示例 `ads.xml` 文件（必须位于**App_Data**文件夹中）：The sample `ads.xml` file (which must be located in the **App_Data** folder): [!code-xml[MobileAdRotatorSample#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/Common/ads.xml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了 属性，则会在从文件中选择播发后发生此事件。If the property is set, this event occurs after the advertisement has been selected from the file. 事件处理程序接收 属性，该属性包含要显示的播发的属性。The event handler receives an property that contains the properties of the advertisement being displayed. 下表显示了提供特定于此事件的信息的属性。The following table shows the properties that provide information specific to this event. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||返回一个字典，该字典包含在引发 事件之后从 XML 文件中提取的所有播发属性。Returns the dictionary that contains all the advertisement properties extracted from an XML file after the event is raised.| ||指定要在 控件中呈现的替换文本和工具提示（如果浏览器支持）。Specifies the alternate text and ToolTip (if supported by the browser) to be rendered in the control.| ||指定要在 控件中呈现的图像。Specifies the image to be rendered in the control.| ||指定单击广告时浏览器导航到的 URL 引用。Specifies the URL reference that the browser navigates to when the advertisement is clicked.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理 事件，只是 类概述的更大示例的一部分。The following code sample handles the event, and is only part of a larger example for the class overview. [!code-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#3)]

para.span: 出于安全目的，XML 文件应该放置在 App_Data 文件夹中，该文件夹配置为不允许用户直接访问 XML 文件。

span.span: For security purposes, XML files should be placed in the App_Data folder, which is configured to not allow users direct access to XML files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以出于各种目的在源 XML 文件中创建元素。You can create elements in the source XML file for a variety of purposes. 例如，你可能想要对移动页和网页使用相同的 XML 文件，但每个文件都要有不同的映像文件。For example, you may want to use the same XML file for both mobile pages and Web pages, but want a different image file for each one. 使用 属性可以指定要用于图像 URL 的 XML 文件中的元素。Use the property to specify which element in your XML file you want to use for the image URL. 你还可以使用单独[\<选项 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素来覆盖此设置，以显示播发的备用图像。You can also use separate [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements to override this setting to show alternate images for the advertisement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性选择 XML 文件中的记录的特定项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to select a specific item from a record in the XML file. 此 .aspx 文件指定可以从 XML 文件的 `` 元素中获取图像 URL 的值，如果用户的浏览器需要 WML 标记，则使用[\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素选择不同的图像 url。This .aspx file specifies that the value for the image URL can be obtained from the `` element of the XML file, and uses a [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element to select a different image URL if the user's browser requires WML markup. `.aspx` 文件：The `.aspx` file: [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#1)] 示例 `ads.xml` 文件（必须位于**App_Data**文件夹中）：The sample `ads.xml` file (which must be located in the **App_Data** folder): [!code-xml[MobileAdRotatorSample#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/Common/ads.xml#2)]

member this.KeywordFilter : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可用于从广告文件中筛选广告的类别关键字。

span.span: Gets or sets a category keyword that you can use to filter advertisements from an advertisement file.

summary.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 用来在指定的类别中标识广告的关键字。

span.span: The keyword used to identify advertisements within a specific category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性具有数据，并且此 属性包含内容，则 控件将选择具有匹配关键字的播发。If the property has data and this property has content, the control selects an advertisement with a matching keyword. 如果 属性有数据，并且此 属性包含内容，但此属性和文件之间没有关键字匹配项，则会显示一个空白图像并生成跟踪警告。If the property has data and this property has content but there is no keyword match between this property and the file, a blank image displays and a trace warning is generated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性从 属性所引用的文件中的图像集合设置首选项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the preference from a collection of images in the file referred by the property. 有关完整的示例代码，请参阅 类概述。For the complete sample code, see the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用[\<选项 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素重写此设置，以显示播发的备用 url。You can use [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements to override this setting to show alternate URLs for the advertisement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性设置播发的目标 URL。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the target URL for the advertisement. 有关完整的示例代码，请参阅 类概述。For the complete sample code, see the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承类可以重写此方法以执行其他任务。Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks. 例如，您可以使用其他条件来筛选 控件选择广告的方式，也可以记录广告以便计费。For example, you can use other criteria to filter how an advertisement is chosen by the control, or you can record the advertisement for billing purposes.
